languages.text: "Благодать {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} не касалась данного объекта. Этот механизм не был осквернен, но изначально рожден ущербным и противоестественным. Кощунственное железо". {n}Паскаль неторопливо извлекает инфопластину.{/n} "Начинаю логирование наблюдений. Да не встанет страх на пути Познания".

traits.locale_text: "Благодать {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g} не касалась данного объекта. Этот механизм не был осквернен, но изначально рожден ущербным и противоестественным. Кощунственное железо". {n}Паскаль неторопливо извлекает инфопластину.{/n} "Начинаю логирование наблюдений. Да не встанет страх на пути Познания".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这件造物并没有得到{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的赐福。它并不是后来才遭到了亵渎，而是制造之初就充满了缺陷与怪异，还是用最具亵渎性的铁制成的。”{n}帕斯卡不慌不忙地拿出一张数据板。{/n}“启动观察记录，不要让恐惧阻碍了寻求知识的道路。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “这件造物并没有得到{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的赐福。它并不是后来才遭到了亵渎，而是制造之初就充满了缺陷与怪异，还是用最具亵渎性的铁制成的。”{n}帕斯卡不慌不忙地拿出一张数据板。{/n}“启动观察记录，不要让恐惧阻碍了寻求知识的道路。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La gracia del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} no ha tocado este objeto. El mecanismo no ha sido profanado, sino que nació corrupto y antinatural. Es un hierro sacrílego». {n}Pasqal saca una tablilla de datos.{/n} «Iniciando el registro de observación. El miedo no debe interponerse en el camino del conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «La gracia del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} no ha tocado este objeto. El mecanismo no ha sido profanado, sino que nació corrupto y antinatural. Es un hierro sacrílego». {n}Pasqal saca una tablilla de datos.{/n} «Iniciando el registro de observación. El miedo no debe interponerse en el camino del conocimiento».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の恩寵はこの物体には及んでいないようです。この機構は冒涜されたのではなく、生まれつき欠陥があり、不自然なのです。最も冒涜的な鉄だ」{n}パスカルは淡々とデータスレートを取り出す。{/n}「観測記録開始。知識の道に恐怖を立ち入らせてはならない」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の恩寵はこの物体には及んでいないようです。この機構は冒涜されたのではなく、生まれつき欠陥があり、不自然なのです。最も冒涜的な鉄だ」{n}パスカルは淡々とデータスレートを取り出す。{/n}「観測記録開始。知識の道に恐怖を立ち入らせてはならない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Gnade des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} hat dieses Objekt nicht berührt. Dieser Mechanismus wurde nicht entweiht, sondern fehlerhaft und unnatürlich geboren. Profanstes Eisen." {n}Pasqal holt ohne jede Eile einen Datablock hervor.{/n} "Initialisiere Beobachtungslog. Angst sollte dem Wissen nicht im Weg stehen."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gnade des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g} hat dieses Objekt nicht berührt. Dieser Mechanismus wurde nicht entweiht, sondern fehlerhaft und unnatürlich geboren. Profanstes Eisen." {n}Pasqal holt ohne jede Eile einen Datablock hervor.{/n} "Initialisiere Beobachtungslog. Angst sollte dem Wissen nicht im Weg stehen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette machine n'a jamais connu la grâce de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Elle n'a pas été profanée, elle est simplement née imparfaite et contre nature. Le fer le plus impie qui soit. » {n}Pasqal sort nonchalamment une plaque de données.{/n} « Ouverture du journal d'observation. Ne laissons pas la peur nous barrer la voie de la connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Cette machine n'a jamais connu la grâce de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Elle n'a pas été profanée, elle est simplement née imparfaite et contre nature. Le fer le plus impie qui soit. » {n}Pasqal sort nonchalamment une plaque de données.{/n} « Ouverture du journal d'observation. Ne laissons pas la peur nous barrer la voie de la connaissance. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}, lütfunu bu cisimden sakınmış. Bu mekanizma bozulmamış, hatalı ve gayritabii doğmuş. Adi bir demir yığını." {n}Pasqal, ağır hareketlerle bir databela ortaya çıkarıyor.{/n} "Gözlem kaydı başlatılıyor. Korku, İrfana mâni olamaz."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s grace has not touched this object. This mechanism was not desecrated but born flawed and unnatural. Iron most profane." {n}Pasqal unhurriedly produces a data-slate.{/n} "Initiating observation log. Let not fear stand in the path of Knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}, lütfunu bu cisimden sakınmış. Bu mekanizma bozulmamış, hatalı ve gayritabii doğmuş. Adi bir demir yığını.” {n}Pasqal, ağır hareketlerle bir databela çıkarıyor.{/n} “Gözlem kaydı başlatılıyor. Korku, İrfan’a mâni olamaz.”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
